de.mrapp.android.view

Class CircularProgressBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • de.mrapp.android.view.CircularProgressBar

  • public class CircularProgressBar
extends View
    A circular progress bar, which has been designed according to the Material design guidelines. Refer to http://www.google.com/design/spec/components/progress-activity.html# progress-activity-types-of-indicators for further information on the Material design guidelines.
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Constructor Summary

      CircularProgressBar(Context context, AttributeSet attributeSet, int defaultStyle)
      Creates a new circular progress bar, which has been designed according to the Material design guidelines.
      CircularProgressBar(Context context, AttributeSet attributeSet, int defaultStyle, int defaultStyleResource)
      Creates a new circular progress bar, which has been designed according to the Material design guidelines.

        attributeSet - The attribute set, the view's attributes should be obtained from, as an instance of the type AttributeSet or null, if no attributes should be obtained

      • CircularProgressBar

        public CircularProgressBar(Context context,
                           AttributeSet attributeSet,
                           @StyleRes
                           int defaultStyle)
        Creates a new circular progress bar, which has been designed according to the Material design guidelines.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, the view should belong to, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        attributeSet - The attribute set, the view's attributes should be obtained from, as an instance of the type AttributeSet or null, if no attributes should be obtained
        defaultStyle - The default style to apply to this view. If 0, no style will be applied (beyond what is included in the theme). This may either be an attribute resource, whose value will be retrieved from the current theme, or an explicit style resource

      • CircularProgressBar

        public CircularProgressBar(Context context,
                           AttributeSet attributeSet,
                           @StyleRes
                           int defaultStyle,
                           int defaultStyleResource)
        Creates a new circular progress bar, which has been designed according to the Material design guidelines.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the view, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        attributeSet - The attribute set, the view's attributes should be obtained from, as an instance of the type AttributeSet or null, if no attributes should be obtained
        defaultStyle - The default style to apply to this view. If 0, no style will be applied (beyond what is included in the theme). This may either be an attribute resource, whose value will be retrieved from the current theme, or an explicit style resource
        defaultStyleResource - A resource identifier of a style resource that supplies default values for the view, used only if the default style is 0 or can not be found in the theme. Can be 0 to not look for defaults
